BOOK

Eager to taste freedom away from home? Siglo Paraiso now welcomes you back with supplementary safety measures to ensure that you get to experience summer without having to worry much about your safety and well-being.

Have a sweet tooth?

Check this out.

Sweet Sandrine is an artisan bakery that produces a wide range of ultra delicious pastries and cakes to satisfy your dessert cravings! What are you waiting for? Find out more.
Crazy for plants?

Check this out.

Whoever said planting is only for those who have greenthumbs most probably hasn't seen such gorgeous plants at all. Check out these succulents and cacti and prepare to be in love! Find out more.
A restaurant in the works

Due to our guests' demand, we are planning to put up a restaurant that will open in 2022. Everyone will soon get the chance to try our truly incomparable dishes. We are ecstatic about this and I'm sure you will be too!

Cold nights at its best

Who wouldn't be excited to toast hotdogs and mallows or do camping at our bonfire area in this cold weather? I know I would! Take it from our guests who got to experience it just last month.
